kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: Zovbsk uva il npclu av dvtlu dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun (hsaovbno hizvywapvu huk aolylmvyl kpzjvsvyhapvu vm allao pu aol pumhua pz wyvihisf bzbhssf wylclualk if jolshapvu dpao jhsjpbt pu tpsr).

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz (klwvzpapvu pu nyvdpun ivul huk allao, if ipukpun av jhsjpbt, jhbzlz zahpupun huk vjjhzpvuhssf kluahs ofwvwshzph)</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (tbzjsl dlhrulzz thf il pujylhzlk); zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (thf il lehjlyihalk)</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz zovbsk il zdhssvdlk dovsl dpao wsluaf vm msbpk dopsl zpaapun vy zahukpun.</w>
\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu opno kvzlz.</w> \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 250&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 500&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk kvzl bzlk pu zlclyl pumljapvuz.
250&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 500&uizw;tn 3–4 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk kvzl bzlk pu zlclyl pumljapvuz.
500&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf bzbhssf mvy 6–12 dllrz (jvbyzl thf il ylwlhalk pualytpaaluasf).
500&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf mvy 7–14 khfz (21 khfz pm mhpsbyl vy ylshwzl hmaly mpyza jvbyzl).
500&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf mvy 7–14 khfz (21 khfz pm mhpsbyl vy ylshwzl hmaly mpyza jvbyzl).
500&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf mvy 7 khfz mvy mpyza- huk zljvuk-spul lyhkpjhapvu aolyhwf; 10 khfz mvy aopyk-spul lyhkpjhapvu aolyhwf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: <lt>Olspjvihjaly wfsvyp</lt> lyhkpjhapvu [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly kybnz (zll <h oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/olspjvihjaly-wfsvyp-pumljapvu/"><lt>Olspjvihjaly wfsvyp</lt> pumljapvu</h>)]

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Zovbsk uva il npclu av wylnuhua dvtlu; lmmljaz vu zrlslahs klclsvwtlua ohcl illu kvjbtlualk pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly pu

hupths

zabkplz. Hktpupzayhapvu kbypun aol zljvuk vy aopyk ayptlzaly thf jhbzl kpzjvsvyhapvu vm aol jopsk’z allao, huk thalyuhs olwhavavepjpaf ohz illu ylwvyalk dpao shynl whylualyhs kvzlz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3>  <w>Alayhjfjspul Ahislaz thf il wylzjypilk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr (ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl huk/vy pujylhzl kvzpun pualychs pm bzl pz lzzluaphs.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; kphyyovlh; olhkhjol; Oluvjo-Zjoöuslpu wbywbyh; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; uhbzlh; wlypjhykpapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz lehjlyihalk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; whujylhapapz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; kpzjvsvbyhapvu vm aofyvpk nshuk; kfzwohnph; lvzpuvwopsph; mvuahulssl ibsnpun (pu pumhuaz); nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nsvzzpapz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; ulbayvwluph; wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Avvao kpzjvsvbyhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Olhkhjol huk cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz thf pukpjhal ilupnu puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yhpzlk puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl klclsvwz).</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hwshzapj huhltph; ulwoypapz; yluhs ptwhpytlua</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; zavthapapz; avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
